title: Vaccination Reminder
email_text:
Vaccination reminder
Your [[patient_name]] needs an update on the regular vaccination. Current vaccination expires [[expiry_date]]. Please contact [[clinic_telephone]] or [[onlinebooking_url]] to book an appointment. Your [[clinic_name]].
